channel.title: Novo Babylonia
channel.description: Novo Babylonia - a fan made story inspired by of one of the greatest Sci-Fi saga's of all time. Produced entirely by volunteers, everything from the music and sound to the writing and acting are done by fans.
channel.itunes:author: Fictionshed
channel.itunes:summary: Novo Babylonia - a fan made story inspired by of one of the greatest Sci-Fi saga's of all time - Babylon 5. Produced entirely by volunteers, everything from the music and sound to the writing and acting are done by fans.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Novo Babylonia

item.title: Episode 20 Part 4: Et sic est infit
item.description:
Episode 20 part 4 - Et sic est infit By Tony Lunn
The battle of Ragesh nebula begins, who will win and who will lose? But does the Universe have a different plan?

Starring:

Tony Lunn
Ashley M Kalfas
Jen Rhodes
Simon Meddings
Chris Canary
Karim C Kronfli
James C Taylor
Renda Carr
Susan J Ritter
Sarah Gilbertson
and Rick Moyer
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 20 part 3: Et sic est infit
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 20 Part 3: Et sic est infit
item.description:
Episode 20 part 3 - Et sic est infit By Tony Lunn
As the crew continue preparations for the first jump, Doctor Weaver and Chris Philips make a discovery and Novo B has a surprise of it's own.

Starring:

item.title: Episode 20 Part 2: Et sic est infit
item.description:
Episode 20 part 2 - Et sic est infit By Tony Lunn
As the crew continue preparations for war, Ross requests a meeting with David, Bryant turns on some systems with surprising results.

item.title: Episode 20 Part 1: Et sic est infit
item.description:
Episode 20 part 1 - Et sic est infit By Tony Lunn
As the crew of Novo B prepare for war, doubts begin to creep in as to whether they can achieve the unachievable, Sheridan and Laâ€™tel have an overdue conversation and Ross gets a call from home.

item.title: Episode 19: Transformations
item.description:
Episode 19 - Transformations By Stephen Cleobury, Jen Rhodes and Tony Lunn
Whilst Philips and Laâ€™Tel are looking for clues on where to find Sheridan and Ross. Ron Felkis is having some troubles of his own.

Starring:

Tony Lunn
Darren Wright
Ashley M Kalfas
Michael Liebmann

item.title: Episode 18: Faces
item.description:
Episode 18 - Faces By Stephen Cleobury
Ron and David are a logger heads over revelations exposed by Ross Jones. La'Tel returns to Novo B and Bryant makes a discovery about the technology of the ship.

Starring:

Ashely M Kalfas
Simon Meddings
Jen Rhodes
Darren Wright
Tony Lunn
James C Taylor
Susan Ritta
Karim Kronfli
and Chris Canary
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 18: Faces
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 17: Axiom
item.description:
Episode 17 - Axiom By Tony Lunn
La'Tel is on her mission to gather intel in relation to a rumoured planetary attack survivor, David and Ron take some well earned rest, but for how long?

Starring:

Ashely M Kalfas
Simon Meddings
Jen Rhodes
Darren Wright
Tony Lunn
Kevin Traynor
Chris Canary
and Sarah Gilbertson.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 17: Axiom
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 16: Trials
item.description:
Episode 16 - Trials By Stephen Cleobury
The crew of Novo Babylonia have to deal with a new threat that is close to home, some would say too close, Terrorists strike out at the ship and it's crew bringing chaos and death. Can the crew save the ship and stop the terrorists? Ross Jones digs a little deeper for information on Ron Felkis.

Starring:

Michael Liebmann as Bryant
Ashley M Kalfas as La'Tel
Simon Meddings as Security Chief Philips
Tony Lunn as David Sheridan
Jen Rhodes as Ross Jones
and Darren Wright as Ron Felkis
With Guest Stars Lee James Sands and Kevin Traynor
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 16: Trials By Stephen Cleobury - Terrorists attack Novo B
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 15: New Horizons
item.description:
Episode 15 - New Horizons By Stephen Cleobury
La'Tel and Bryant take a tour of Novo B and end up with a memorable experience! Ross Jones is causing more trouble and Ron has a surprise.

Starring:

Michael Liebmann as Bryant
Ashley M Kalfas as La'Tel
Simon Meddings as Security Chief Philips
Tony Lunn as David Sheridan
Jen Rhodes as Ross Jones
and Darren Wright as Ron Felkis
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 15: New Horizons By Stephen Cleobury - La'Tel and Bryant tour Novo B
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 14: Reassignment
item.description:
Episode 14 - Reassignment By Tony Lunn
Bryant, La'Tel and Ron are back onboard Novo B. They are heading to David's office for a debrief but tensions are mounting and La'Tel and Bryant are not happy at loosing their ship and the revelation of betrayal.

Starring:

Michael Liebmann as Bryant
Ashley M Kalfas as La'Tel
Simon Meddings as Security Chief Philips
Tony Lunn as David Sheridan
Jen Rhodes as Ross Jones
Kevin Traynor as Clayton West
and Darren Wright as Ron Felkis
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 14: Reassignment By Tony Lunn
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Special edition part two - Conflict By Kevin Traynor and Tony Lunn
item.description:
Special edition part two - Conflict By Kevin Traynor and Tony Lunn
This is a special edition of Novo Babylonia to celebrate its fourth birthday - we follow a small Brakiri fleet on a routine patrol. Produced by Drunken Fish Entertainment.

Starring:

Kevin Traynor as Engineer Krell and Akresh one,
Rach Kairi Mansfield as Akresh 2,
Alex Bell as Akresh 3,
Silas Carder as the Flight Controller,
Chris Sekhanan - First Officer,
Craig Nixon as the captain
and special guest Nathan P Butler
item.itunes:subtitle: Special edition part two - Conflict By Kevin Traynor and Tony Lunn
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.description:
Special edition part one - Strange readings By Kevin Traynor and Tony Lunn
This is a special edition of Novo Babylonia to celebrate its fourth birthday - we follow a small Brakiri fleet on a routine patrol. Produced by Drunken Fish Entertainment.

item.title: Episode 13: Et Tu
item.description:
Episode 13 - Et Tu By Tony Lunn
La'Tel receives news from Sheridan that she doesn't like one bit...

Starring:

Michael Liebmann as Bryant,
Ashley M Kalfas as La'Tel,
Antony James as Helm Officer,
Ro Karen as CNC,
Tony Lunn as David Sheridan,
Jen Rhodes as Ross Jones,
Eoin McGonagle as Comms,
Rick Moyer as Mister X
and Darren Wright as Ron Felkis

item.title: Episode 12: Escape
item.description:
Episode 12 - Escape By Steve Cleobury and Tony Lunn
It looks like the end for La'Tel and the crew in their crippled whitestar stuck adrift in hyperspace with mortal danger getting closer by the second.

Starring:

Michael Liebmann as Bryant,
Ashley M Kalfas as La'Tel,
Antony James as Helm Officer,
Ro Karen as CNC,
Tony Lunn as David Sheridan
and Darren Wright as Ron Felkis
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 12: Escape By Steve Cleobury and Tony Lunn
item.author: fictionshedpodcast@gmail.com (Fictionshed)
item.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 11: Discovery
item.description:
Episode 11 - Discovery By Steve Cleobury and Tony Lunn
A lone whitestar is patrolling the Jarong Sector when things take an unexpected turn.

Starring:

Michael Liebmann as Bryant,
Ashley M Kalfas as La'Tel,
Antony James as Helm Officer,
Ro Karen as The Captain,
Tony Lunn as David Sheridan
and Darren Wright as Ron Felkis

item.title: Episode 10: Loose Ends
item.description:
Episode 10 - Loose Ends By Steve Cleobury
David recounts the first few weeks on his official captains log. Prince Regent Vintari has a surprise that Ron and David are not going to like.

Starring:

Tony Lunn
and Darren Wright
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 10: Loose Ends By Steve Cleobury

item.title: Episode 09: Rebirth
item.description:
Episode 9 - Rebirth By Tony Lunn
David approaches the ISA to sanction the Novo Project ship, but there is resistance. Will the council confirm that they are willing to support his request?

Starring:

Darren Wright
Tony Lunn
Steve Cleobury
Steve Danielson
and Anthony James
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 09: Rebirth By Tony Lunn

item.description:
Episode 08 - Emperor’s Twilight By Steve Cleobury
Emperor Vir Cotto awakes from a terrible nightmare and finds an old friend with some mysterious news...

Starring:

Darren Wright
Tony Lunn
Ro Karen
and Steve Danielson

David and Ron have rumbled V'Tan and forced him to reveal the location of the Novo Project. What will they find?â€¦

item.title: Episode 03: A Shape in the light of shadows
item.description:
Episode 3 - A Shape in the Light of Shadows By Steve Cleobury and Tony Lunn
Delenn reveals to her student Cerena, that there is a second book of G'Kar, the keepers of the book are having a hard time on Minbar, and some think that they know who is responsible.â€¦

Starring:

Darren Wright
Destine Lunn
and Tony Lunn

item.title: Episode 01: Pride and Provenance (Pilot)
item.description:
Episode 1 - Pride and Provenance (The pilot episode) By Tony Lunn
We find David Sheridan taking up office in his new position as the head of the ISA Strategic and Tactical Command. David is already feeling resentment at the appointment and he's not the only one.

Starring:

Tony Lunn

channel.media:description: Novo Babylonia - a fan made story inspired by of one of the greatest Sci-Fi saga's of all time - Babylon 5. Produced entirely by volunteers, everything from the music and sound to the writing and acting are done by fans.
